thread.title: Twitter CEO gives a third of his Twitter stake to employees
thread.title_full: Twitter CEO gives a third of his Twitter stake to employees

title: Twitter CEO gives a third of his Twitter stake to employees
text: October 22, 2015 at 21:33 PM EDT Twitter CEO gives a third of his Twitter stake to employees Twitter's newly returned CEO Jack Dorsey announced via Twitter that he plans to give around a third of his personal stake in the company - around 1 percent of Twitter - to an employee equity pool.
